content.content: Hi all, As discussed during the last Whisper working group call, I am an easily confused individual, and I’ve been confused by the status of EIP-627 as a draft. I opened a pull request to change the status to Final:   github.com/ethereum/EIPs       Mark EIP 627 final     by atoulme   on 06:41AM - 15 Dec 18 UTC   1 commits   changed 1 files   with 2 additions   and 2 deletions.        Please feel free to review and comment.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining the status of EIP-627 and has opened a pull request to change its status to Final. The author is also asking for feedback on the proposal. A 3rd party could give constructive criticism of the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
Author of proposal is asking for feedback
